title: BBC Local Live: Northamptonshire for Friday, 8 January 2016 - BBC News
summary: northampton town chairman kelvin thomas has told a fans forum a conference centre and hotel could still be part of development plans at sixfields .
administrators for luxury boat-builders fairline say they 're still talking to interested buyers .
news . sport , travel and weather updates resume at 08:00 on monday .

documents.title: our live courage through the day
text: local live has finished for northamptonshire today , but we 'll be back on monday from 08:00 with all the latest news , weather , sport and travel for the county .

documents.title: driver who helped alleged rape victim urgently sought
text: police in northampton investigating an alleged rape are appealing for a motorist who stopped to help to come forward .
the woman , who was in a distressed state , flagged down the driver of a dark vauxhall astra in upper mounts in the early hours of yesterday morning .
he the woman up at the back of the crown court building , then took her to southbridge .
author: Sarah Foster
BBC Radio Northampton

documents.title: boat builder will 'look to support ' fairline workers
text: i 've been to the london boat show to find out whether fairline , which has gone into administration , is an isolated case or whether business is booming for their competitors .
i spoke to phil popham , from boat builders sunseeker , based in dorset , and one of fairline 's competitors
author: Richard Bond
BBC Look East business correspondent

documents.title: weather : dry this evening , but rain overnight
text: staying mainly dry , but with the small chance of a shower later in the night with lows of around 4-6c ( around 40f ) .
author: Chris Bell
BBC Look East weather

documents.title: us ambassador 'asked me for a mug '
text: earlier today the us ambassador to the uk , matthew barzun , was in northampton visiting politicians , businesses and schools and answering questions on donald trump and gun control .
but before his security ushered him away he pulled me aside and asked for a favour .
apparently the ambassador is a collector of local radio stations mugs , and has asked me to send him a bbc radio northampton one .
we are happy to oblige and in fact we 'll send him two - one for the ambassador and one for barack obama .
author: Carroll Weston
BBC Radio Northampton

documents.title: travel : long delays on the a45 eastbound
text: there is one lane blocked and long delays on the eastbound a45 between riverside and the great billing way in northampton because of a broken down lorry .
author: BBC Travel

documents.title: headlines : police make appeal for motorist mp to meet minister over rail freight terminal
text: if you 're catching up :
author: Sarah Foster
BBC Radio Northampton

documents.title: mp to find out how much of a 'priority ' proposed rail freight terminal is
text: the mp for south northamptonshire , andrea leadsom says there are unanswered questions about plans for a rail freight terminal that could be built between milton malsor and blisworth .
people living in both villages say they are opposed to the idea , which they say would destroy the rural character of the area .
developer ashfield say it 'll create thousands of jobs and boost the economy .
author: Willy Gilder
BBC Northampton

documents.title: archaeologists dig up 'unexpected ' evidence of iron age life
text: archaeologists who uncovered remains from an iron age village on land where a housing estate is being built said the discovery was `` totally unexpected '' .
experts from the university of leicester believe the remains , in the village of welford , date back more than 2,000 years .
the discoveries of pottery will be shown to primary schools before going on display in a museum in northamptonshire .
author: BBC News England

documents.title: fa cup third round is 'just a game of football ' for chris wilder
text: mk dons visit sixfields in the fa cup , meaning the cobblers will need to beat a side two divisions higher to make it through to the fourth round .
but boss chris wilder says this game is no different to any other
author: BBC Sport

documents.title: former home secretary david blunkett visits northampton schools
text: the former home secretary and education secretary david blunkett visited schools in and around northampton yesterday .
author: Northants Herald & Post

documents.title: us ambassador visits northampton
text: matthew barzun , the us ambassador to the uk , visited northampton earlier today having been invited by northampton north mp michael ellis .
he met local politicians , took a tour of the town and headed to kingsthorpe college
positivity the order of the day for my visit @ twitterid this morning .

documents.title: tigers match important for 'bragging rights , ' says hanrahan
text: fly-half jj hanrahan will start for northampton saints tomorrow against leicester in his first experience of the east midlands derby .
he told me he knows how important such local matches are from playing for munster against leinster in the past
author: Graham McKechnie
BBC Radio Northampton sport

documents.title: grant given to fermyn woods country park for new children 's play area
text: fermyn woods country park has been given a £ 23,000 grant to create a new children 's play area , featuring climbing frames , sculptured butterfly seating , trails that contain living willow dens , stepping stones and climbing logs .
the money has come from the 'community fund ' of construction company , mick george .
author: Martin Borley
BBC Radio Northampton

documents.title: cobblers wo n't sell goalkeeper smith 'cheaply '
text: with the transfer window now open , northampton town chairman kelvin thomas told fans last night that the club does not need to , and do n't want to , sell any players .
however , he admitted if a big club made an offer for goalkeeper adam smith ( they would n't stand in his way , although he added `` we wo n't sell players cheaply '' .
author: Pete Cooper
BBC Local Live

documents.title: 'task force ' formed to help fairline boats workers
text: a task force has been pulled together to ask `` how can we help workers '' at in administration fairline boats .
a total of 380 people were made redundant at the corby and oundle based company .
the administrators are hopeful they can still find a buyer for the business .

in the meantime , jo lappin , from northampton enterprise partnership , said a task force involving the likes of corby borough council and the department of work & pensions would try to help workers .
author: Pete Cooper
BBC Local Live

documents.title: two major retailers end rumours of kettering store closures
text: two major retailers have quashed rumours they are set to close their stores in the newlands shopping centre in kettering .
author: Northamptonshire Telegraph

documents.title: weather : mostly cloudy afternoon with a few showers
text: it 'll be a breezy end to the day , with the odd shower at times , but there will also be some lengthy sunny breaks .
there were clear skies over higham ferrers this morning , as captured by bbc weather watcher 'ele ' .
top temperature of 8c ( 46f ) .
author: BBC Weather

documents.title: wilder turned down 'decent job ' to stay at cobblers
text: at an open forum for northampton town fans last night , cobblers chairman kevin thomas revealed that a week and half before he took over manager chris wilder turned down a `` decent job '' .
mr thomas also said wilder was on a rolling contract and there was `` no end date for his contract '' .
author: Pete Cooper
BBC Local Live

documents.title: police highlight 'big drop ' in christmas crime
text: northamptonshire police say 'operation lapland ' - aimed at preventing criminal activity in northampton town centre over christmas - resulted in a big drop in shoplifting
author: Pete Cooper
BBC Local Live

documents.title: headlines : urgent appeal for foster carers fairline could still have buyer
text: these are our lunchtime headlines :
author: Sarah Foster
BBC Radio Northampton

documents.title: george north moves to centre for tigers match
text: wales wing george north has moved alongside luther burrell to outside centre to face leicester tigers at welford road tomorrow .
lee dickson returns to captain the side and victor matfield will partner courtney lawes in the second row .
saints team for # derbyday !
@ twitterid great looking team for # derbyday # ibelieve
@ twitterid looking forward to seeing a saints win on my first visit to welford road # derbyday

documents.title: burglars took two vehicles from outside daventry house
text: burglars broke into a daventry house while the occupants were asleep and stole a number of items and two vehicles from the drive .

the property in quantock close was broken into sometime between 23.30 on tuesday and 07.30 the following day.one of the stolen cars has since been found by the police , but a blue transit van is still missing .

documents.title: former luton town player dreyer joins cobblers as head of recruitment
text: northampton town have appointed john dreyer as interim head of recruitment until the end of the season .
dreyer , 52 , played over 200 games for luton town in the first division , and has also been assistant manager at preston , stevenage and rushden & diamonds .
author: Kris Holland
BBC Radio Northampton

documents.title: county council say there is `` very little ' to stop people being foster carers
text: northamptonshire county countil has launched an urgent appeal for new foster carers to come forward .
the number of children in care in the county is at a record high , reaching 980 as of tuesday this week .
stuart ratcliffe has been finding out more
author: BBC Look East

documents.title: archaeologists recover iron age pottery at site in welford
text: university of leicester archaeological services discovered iron age pottery and structural evidence of an iron age roundhouse during the archaeological excavation at newlands road in welford .
the roundhouse measured some 9m in diameter , had an entrance at the east side , and several internal features survived as well .
today there is an open day at the site for the local primary school children and their parents .
author: Pete Cooper
BBC Local Live

documents.title: east stand design 'not ideal ' but will be developed , says cobblers chairman
text: cobblers chairman kelvin thomas last night told fans at an open forum that the club had considered knocking down the east stand and starting again , but instead will work with what is there - even though the design was `` not ideal '' .

mr thomas , who took over six week ago , said `` no decision have been made yet '' on the stand , but added if it is n't finished in time for next season they will look at putting in temporary seats .
author: Pete Cooper
BBC Local Live

documents.title: sixfields east stand could 'still have conference centre and hotel '
text: in an open forum for northampton town fans , chairman kelvin thomas said they are looking at building a conference centre and hotel as part of the redevelopment of the stalled east stand .
he told the forum the club is in detailed discussions with the buckingham group and northampton borough council , but there are `` still complications and [ it ] was n't a very clean situation . ''
author: Pete Cooper
BBC Local Live

documents.title: 'foster care has changed me so much '
text: charlie , who 's been in foster care since she was 15 , says it 's changed her `` so much in a good way '' .
thanks to a supportive foster family she 's now at university .
the number of children in care in northamptonshire is at a record high , having reached almost 1,000 , and the county council says more foster carers are desperately needed .
author: Stuart Ratcliffe
BBC Look East

documents.title: fairline administrators hoping for buyer
text: exactly one month ago today , administrators for fairline , based in oundle and corby , announced 380 redundancies .
now they 've said they still talking to interested buyers .
a task force made up of local authorities , a trade union and businesses has been established with the aim of getting redundant workers back into employment .
a jobs fair , information and advice day will be held next thursday at the corby cube .
author: Martin Borley
BBC Radio Northampton

documents.title: 'why us ? ' says northampton designer clothing store boss hit by five raids since christmas
text: the boss of the oldest menswear shop in northampton says he can not fathom why someone would break into his store five times since christmas - and on one occasion run off with a clothed window dummy .
author: Northampton Chronicle & Echo

documents.title: weather : dry start then showers for a time
text: some brightness at first , however a few showers are set to sweep in later this morning .
there may be the odd shower this afternoon but also some sunny breaks .
top temperature of 8c ( 46f ) .
author: Elizabeth Rizzini
BBC Look East weather

documents.title: a5199 closed in chapel brampton
text: the a5199 is closed in both directions at the merry tom lane junction in chapel brampton because of a collision and vehicle fire .
author: BBC Travel

documents.title: headlines : children in care at record high fairline could still have buyer
text: here are our top stories :
author: Andrew Radd
BBC Radio Northampton

documents.title: good morning and welcome to local live for northamptonshire
text: between now and 18:00 we 'll be bringing you the latest news , weather , sport and travel for northamptonshire
you can contact us via email and twitter .
author: Pete Cooper
BBC Local Live
